column2:
Amazing movie

I loved loved watching this movie with its excellent plot, screenplay directing and Dakore and the cast delivered so well on the acting. Our culture and heritage was fully represented.Oscar worthy if it was in indigenous category. Definitely a 10/10 for me
column3:
Eré tó jọjú
 
Mo fẹ́ràn láti máa wo ere yìí nítorí àkójọpọ̀ ìtàn rẹ̀, ìdárí àwòrán eré, dakore àti bí àwọn tó kó pa nínu eré náà se fakọyọ ninu ere síse.  Wọ́n gbé àṣà ati ìṣẹ̀ṣe wa lárugẹ nínú eré náà. Ó yẹ́ kí ó gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ ọ́síkà tí ó bá jẹ́ pé ti wa n ti wa ni. Láì sí àní àní, eré náà gba ẹ́ẹ̀wá lori ẹ́ẹ̀wá láti ọ̀dọ̀ mi.

fiimu iyanu

Mo nifẹ wiwo fiimu yii pẹlu idite ti o dara julọ, itọsọna iboju ati Dakore ati simẹnti naa ti jiṣẹ daradara lori iṣere naa. Asa ati iní wa ni kikun ni ipoduduro.Oscar yẹ ti o ba wa ni ẹka abinibi. Ni pato kan 10/10 fun mi

column2:
Loved this Movie

I was really surprised to read negative reviews for this movie. Do we truly know what a good movie is? This movie was really good, very enjoyable. Well developed characters, believable and relatable story line. And the quality, fantastic. Well done guys. Loved it even more than wedding party 1 and 2. I am not disappointed at all.
column3:
Mo fẹ́ràn eré yi
 
Ó se mí ní kàyéfì láti ka ìròyìn burúkú lóri àjábọ̀ eré yìí. ṣé ati ẹ mọn eré ti ódára bí?
Eré yii dára ósì lárinrin púpọ̀ pẹ̀lú. Àwon òsèré to pójú òsùwòn, ìtàn to dabi ìsẹ̀lẹ̀ tootọ. ati kúọ́lítì rẹ̀ kamama. Ekú isẹ́ takuntakun. Mo fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ gan ju "Wedding party" apá  kinní ati apá kejì lọ. kò já mi kulẹ̀ rárá
column4:
Nifẹ Movie yii

O yà mi gaan lati ka awọn atunyẹwo odi fun fiimu yii. Njẹ a mọ nitõtọ kini fiimu ti o dara jẹ? Fiimu yii dara gaan, igbadun pupọ. Awọn ohun kikọ ti o ni idagbasoke daradara, igbagbọ ati laini itan ibatan. Ati awọn didara, ikọja. Daradara ṣe buruku. Ni ife ti o ani diẹ sii ju igbeyawo party 1 ati 2. Emi ko adehun ni gbogbo.

column2:
Hilarious & light hearted

Chief Daddy is the type of movie you can watch over and over. The actors are fantastic, and the movie overall is a not-so-serious narration with valuable teachable moments. Sure there are a few plot holes that could have been handled better, but overall I would recommend.
column3: "Chief Daddy " jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwon eré tí o le wò kí o  tún wò. Àwon òsèré inú rẹ fakọyọ àti wípé eré na je akójopọ̀ ìtàn ti kò gbomínínú pẹ̀lú awon àkókò ẹkọ ti o ni ìtumọ̀. bótilẹ̀jẹ́ àkójọpọ̀ eré naa ní àwon àbùkùn ti o yẹ ki wọ̀n gbìyànjù lati tun se,sùgbón ju gbogbo ẹ lọ mo ma sọ nípa rẹ̀.
column4:
Alarinrin & ina ọkàn

Oloye Daddy ni iru fiimu ti o le wo leralera. Awọn oṣere naa jẹ ikọja, ati gbogbogbo fiimu jẹ alaye ti ko ṣe pataki pẹlu awọn akoko ikẹkọ ti o niyelori. Daju pe awọn iho Idite diẹ wa ti o le ṣe itọju dara julọ, ṣugbọn lapapọ Emi yoo ṣeduro.

column2:
Breath of fresh air!

FINALLY - a movie shot in Nigeria with international standards. Effortlessly funny and cunning, superior direction and cinematography. Eclectic, intentionally entertaining and attention gripping. Perfect blend of wit and humor depicted through deliberately complex yet simple visuals. Left me with the happy fuzzys.
column3:
Imi ti afẹfẹ titun! 
 
Níkẹyìn – eré tí a yà ní Nàìjíríà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlànà àgbáyé.  ó pa ni lẹ́ẹ̀rín pẹ̀lú àrékérekè, ìtọ́sọ́nà ti o ga jùlọ ati sinimá. ó dánilárayá ó sì mú àkíyèsí ènìyàn dání. ìdarapọ̀ pípé ti ọgbọ́n ati akitiyan tí a fihàn nípasẹ̀ àwórán tí kò le. Ó fi mí sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ayọ̀ ìdùnnú.
column4:
Imi ti afẹfẹ titun!

ÌKÁYÌN – fíìmù tí a yà ní Nàìjíríà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlànà àgbáyé. Lailakitiyan funny ati arekereke, itọsọna ti o ga julọ ati sinima. Eclectic, imomose idanilaraya ati akiyesi dimu. Idarapọ pipe ti ọgbọn ati arin takiti ti a fihan nipasẹ idiju mọọmọ sibẹsibẹ awọn wiwo ti o rọrun. Fi mi silẹ pẹlu awọn iruju idunnu.

column3:
ìyàlẹ́nu ìtúra.
 
.. NÍKẸYÌN – eré tí a yà ní Nàìjíríà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlànà àgbáyé.  ó pani lẹ́ẹ̀rín pẹ̀lú àrékérekè, ìtọ́sọ́nà ti o ga jùlọ ati sinimá. o dánilárayá ó sì mu àkíyésì ènìyàn dání. ìdàrapọ̀ pípé ti ọgbọ́n ati akitiyan  ti a fihàn nípasẹ̀ àwòrán ti ko le, ere naa fimisilẹ pelu ayọ idunnu.
column4:
Iyalẹnu onitura...
ÌKÁYÌN – fíìmù tí a yà ní Nàìjíríà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlànà àgbáyé. Lailakitiyan funny ati arekereke, itọsọna ti o ga julọ ati sinima. Ecclectic, imomose idanilaraya ati akiyesi dimu. Idarapọ pipe ti ọgbọn ati arin takiti ti a fihan nipasẹ idiju mọọmọ sibẹsibẹ awọn wiwo ti o rọrun. Fi mi silẹ pẹlu awọn iruju idunnu

column2:
A movie that anyone can relate too

Had the opportunity of viewing this movie at the Oakland Film Festival and exceeded my expectation. It is very entertaining and kept my eyes glued to the screen. It has great humor. The Giwa sister's relationship is very relatable and you go on a journey with them as they get back on their feet. The music in this movie is really really good as well. It is a family friendly movie that I wish I got to watch with my entire family.
column3:
Eré ti ẹnikẹ́ni le lé rò sìí
 
Mo ní àyè láti wo eré yii ní àjọ̀dún erè Oakland àti pé ó kọjá èrò  mi. ó dánilárayá púpọ̀ tí mi  ó lè gbé  ojú mi ​kúrò làra ẹ̀rọ àwòrán náà. Eré àrín tàkìtì ni. ìbásepọ̀ arábìnrin Gíwá jẹ́ nkan ti o jẹ́ mímọ̀ àti pé alọ sí ìrìn-àjó pẹ̀lú wọn bí wọ́n ṣe padà sí ẹsẹ̀ wọn. Orin inú eré  yii dára gaan lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀. Erẹ́ naa jẹ́ ètó fún ìdílé ati ojúlùmọ̀, ó sì wù mí  pé èmi ati ẹbí mi ló Jọ wòó papọ̀.
column4:
A movie ti ẹnikẹni le relate ju

Ni aye ti wiwo fiimu yii ni Festival Fiimu Oakland ati pe o kọja ireti mi. O jẹ idanilaraya pupọ ati pe o jẹ ki oju mi ṣopọ mọ iboju naa. O ni nla arin takiti. Ibasepo arabinrin Giwa jẹ ibatan pupọ ati pe o lọ si irin-ajo kan pẹlu wọn bi wọn ṣe pada si ẹsẹ wọn. Orin ti o wa ninu fiimu yii dara gaan daradara. O ti wa ni a ebi ore movie ti mo fẹ Mo ni lati wo pẹlu mi gbogbo ebi.

column2:
Best of Nollywood

This is truly an exceptional film. the acting as beautiful and believable. Kudos to the team behind the film and Biola Alabi. Seyi Shay is a star abeg. And the camera WOW!!! Nollywood to the world!!!
column3:
ÈyÍ tó dárajù ninu Nollywood
 
Eré yii jẹ́ ìyàtọ̀ nítòótọ́. àwọn òsèré naa gbìnyànjú wón dẹ̀ ku iṣẹ́ takuntakun. Mo gbóríyìn fún àwon ẹgbẹ́ tí ó wà lẹ́hìn eré naa ati Bíọ́lá Àlàbí. Ìràwọ̀ ni Seyi Shay ẹ jọ̀wọ́ . Ẹ̀rọ ayàwòrán naa pé.  Òkè òkè bayi ni Nollywood nlọ
column4:
Ti o dara ju ti Nollywood

Eleyi jẹ iwongba ti ẹya exceptional fiimu. awọn anesitetiki bi lẹwa ati ki o gbagbọ. Kudos si egbe ti o wa lẹhin fiimu naa ati Biola Alabi. Seyi Shay ni a star abeg. Ati kamẹra WOW !!! Nollywood si aye!!!

column2:
Beautiful Love story

This film is Hot like fire. i am so in love with it. I can't wait to watch it again. The love is so good. I am proud of Nigerian movies.
column3:
Ìtàn ìfẹ́ tí ó lẹ́wà
 
Eré yii jó ni lọ́wọ́ bìi ẹ̀ya iná. Mo fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ lọ́pọ̀lopọ̀. N'kò sì lè dúró láti tun wò. Ìfẹ́ yii dára púpọ̀. Mo gbóríyìn fún  eré ti orílẹ̀èdè Nàìjíríà
column4:
Lẹwa Love itan

Fiimu yii gbona bi ina. Mo nifẹ rẹ pupọ. Emi ko le duro lati wo lẹẹkansi. Ife naa dara to. Mo ni igberaga fun awọn sinima Naijiria.

column2:
Beats my imagination!

Amazing content and story line. One of those movies you'll want to watch over and over again. A new dawn for Nollywood! Kudos to the team!!!
column3:
ó kojá oun tí mo lérò!
 
Èyí jẹ̀ àtọ̀pọ̀ ati ìtàn ìyàlẹ́nu . ọ̀kan làra àwon eré tí o ma níìfẹ́ lati wò tún wò. Ojú mọ́ ọ̀tun mọ́ Nollywood! Mo gbé òsùbà fún won!
column4:
Lu mi oju inu!

Iyanu akoonu ati itan laini. Ọkan ninu awọn fiimu ti iwọ yoo fẹ lati wo leralera. Owurọ tuntun fun Nollywood! Adupe fun egbe!!!

column2:
Amazing production, impressive quality

Once I started I couldn't stop, I even watched it over and I NEVER do that! Fantastic storyline, great characters and performances. The production is my highlight, you can tell the level of detail that was put into this brilliant movie. I'm very impressed! More please!
column3:
Àtòpọ̀ tó dára, isẹ́ ìyàlẹ́nu ló jẹ́
 
 Níwòn ìgbà tí mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ mi ò lè dúró mó, mo ti ẹ̀ tun wò lèra tí nkò se bẹ́ẹ̀ rí!. Ìtàn tó fakọyọ, àwon òsèré ati isẹ́ tí ó lágbára. A lè sọ nípa ojúlówó àpèjuwe tí ó kún inú eré yii. Ó wú mi lórí, òmíràn ẹjo.
column4:
Iṣelọpọ iyalẹnu, didara iwunilori

Ni kete ti Mo bẹrẹ Emi ko le duro, Mo ti wo paapaa ati pe MO KO ṣe iyẹn! Itan itan ikọja, awọn kikọ nla ati awọn iṣe. Iṣẹjade naa jẹ afihan mi, o le sọ ipele ti alaye ti a fi sinu fiimu ti o wuyi. Mo wú mi lórí gan-an! Jọwọ diẹ sii!

column2:
SUPERBLY REFRESHING!!!

Everything about this movie was just on POINT! The story line, characters and directing..down to costumes. I absolutely enjoyed this!! My popcorn was out in minutes! Love love love! Please make more movies!!!
column3:
Ó TU NI LÁRA!
 
Gbogbo ǹkan tó wà nípa eré yìí ló dára! Ìtàn-àn eré náà, àwọn òṣèré, àti dídarí, títí dé àwọn ǹkan ìmúra. Mo gbádùn èyìí lọ́pọ̀! Gúgúrú mi tán-án ní ìséjú péréte! Mo fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ gaan! Ẹ jòwó, ẹ ṣe fíìmù síi.
column4:
ITUMOSI TODAJU!!!

Ohun gbogbo nipa fiimu yii wa lori POINT! Laini itan, awọn kikọ ati itọsọna… si isalẹ si awọn aṣọ. Mo gbadun eyi gaan!! Guguru mi ti jade ni iṣẹju diẹ! Ni ife ife ife! Jọwọ ṣe awọn fiimu diẹ sii !!!

column2: This is by far the best production from nollywood! It looks more like an African American film. The acting is top notch and to find out it is the lead actresses first film, thumbs up.
column3: Eré yii jẹ́ eré tí ètò rẹ̀ dára jù lọ lára eré Nollywood. Ṣe ló jọ eré Afíríkà àti Amẹ́ríkà. Eré ṣíṣe inu rẹ̀ nẹgba, ótún wá yani lẹ́ nu torí pé eré àkọ́kọ́ tí òsèré asíwájú kọ́kọ́ kó pa ninu rẹ̀ ni. Mo júbà.
column4: Eyi jẹ iṣelọpọ ti o dara julọ lati nollywood! O wulẹ siwaju sii bi ohun African American film. Awọn osere ni oke ogbontarigi ati lati wa jade ti o jẹ asiwaju awọn oṣere akọkọ fiimu, atampako soke.

column2:
A Brilliant Movie

Just watched Lara and the Beat on Netflix. This film is wonderful. Beautiful cinematography, on point acting, a great story, nice music and wholesome entertainment that the whole family can enjoy.
column3:
Eré tó tayọ
 
Mo ṣẹ̀ wo Lara ati Beat lóri Netflix .
Eré yii ya ni lẹ́nu. Ìtanná eré tí ó rẹwà, eré síse tí ó wà n bẹ́, ìtàn tí ó lágbára, orin tí ó dára ati ìdárayá tí ó pé tí gbogbo ẹbí máa gbádùn.
column4:
Fiimu Alarinrin

O kan wo Lara ati Lu lori Netflix. Fiimu yii jẹ iyanu. Aworan sinima ti o lẹwa, lori iṣere aaye, itan nla, orin to dara ati ere idaraya to dara ti gbogbo ẹbi le gbadun.

column2: Lara and the Beats was the authenic soul nurturing plate of REAL Jollof with plantains, smiles, and love. Hopefully now it will become viral on the small screen, and get all of the accolates it deserves. A must see multiple times.
column3: Lara ati beat ni ojúlówó eré tí n tọ́jú adùn ẹ̀rín àti ìfẹ́. Mo nírètí wípé ó ma di eré tí a maa ma wò ní inu gbogbo amóhùnmáwòrán káàkiri, tí yòó si gba ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìwúrí tí ó yẹ. Àwò tún wó ni.
column4: Lara ati awọn Beats jẹ awo titọju ti ẹmi ti GIDI Jollof pẹlu awọn ọgbà ọgbà, ẹrin, ati ifẹ. Nireti bayi o yoo di gbogun ti lori kekere iboju, ati ki o gba gbogbo awọn ti awọn accolates ti o ye. A gbọdọ rii ni igba pupọ.

column2:
Brilliant movie
This is a brilliant export from Nollywood. I am amazed at the level of quality of this film. Nigerian cinema is truly growing. Good job and we need a sequel.
column3:
Eré tó tayọ
 
Eré yii je eré tí ó tayọ lati ọwọ́o nollywood. Ìyà lénu ló jẹ́ fún mi bí ìpele dídára eré yii ṣe jẹ́. Sinimá Naijiria n ga si nítootọ́. Isẹ́ tó dára, a ní lò àtẹ̀lé rẹ.
column4:
fiimu ti o wuyi
Eyi jẹ okeere ti o wuyi lati Nollywood. Mo jẹ iyalẹnu ni ipele didara fiimu yii. Sinima Naijiria n dagba nitootọ. Iṣẹ to dara ati pe a nilo atẹle kan.

column2: The story line was quite good and didn't take itself too seriously which made it a fun watch, the colours and clothes were wow! The cinematography was incredible, the actors and actresses did a good job.
column3:
Ìtàn eré naa dára tí kò sì gba kó le kó le, e
èyí tí ó jẹ́ kí ó jẹ́ àwòrín ẹ̀rín. Àwon àwọ̀ aṣọ won rẹwà gan!. Àwon ayàwòrán won ṣiṣẹ́ ìyàlẹ́nu. Àwon òṣèré naa ṣiṣẹ́ takuntakun.
column4: Laini itan naa dara pupọ ati pe ko gba ararẹ ni pataki eyiti o jẹ ki o jẹ aago igbadun, awọn awọ ati awọn aṣọ jẹ wow! Cinematography jẹ iyalẹnu, awọn oṣere ati awọn oṣere ṣe iṣẹ to dara.

column2: Refreshing, New, Love Story!! This is one of the best love. funny, well acted stories I have seen for a while! I love the beautiful black actors, and enjoyed that it is just as good as the typical "Hollywood" made movies!!
column3: Ìtura, ọ̀tun, eré ìtàn ìfẹ́. Èyí jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwon eré ìfẹ́ tó dára. Ó pani lẹrin, eré tí won ṣe dáradára tí mo ti mọ̀ rí fún ọjọ́ pípẹ́ re. Mo fẹ́ran àwon òṣèré arewà dúdú ati wípé ó jọ  eré ìfẹ́ Indianí.
column4: Itura, Tuntun, Itan Ifẹ!! Eyi jẹ ọkan ninu ifẹ ti o dara julọ. funny, daradara sise itan Mo ti ri fun a nigba ti! Mo ni ife awọn lẹwa dudu olukopa, ati ki o gbadun wipe o jẹ o kan bi o dara bi awọn aṣoju "Hollywood" ṣe sinima!!

column2:
Loved it

It was funny and good acting. Very nice romantic comedy! It nice to see African movies and actors
column3:
Mo fẹ́ran rẹ̀
 
Ó pani lẹrin, ó sì jẹ́ eré tó dára. Ó jọjú ó sì jẹ́ eré ìfẹ́. Inu mi dun láti rí àwon òṣèré ati erée Naijiria.
column4:
Nifẹ rẹ

O je funny ati ki o dara osere. Gan dara romantic awada! O dara lati wo awọn fiimu ati awọn oṣere Afirika

column2:
Super Cute Romantic Comedy
This movie was really fun, funny, and beautifully filmed. I really liked it, and the clothing and style was quite extra. I highly recommend it.
column3:
Eré alárinrin tí ó ní ìfẹ́ nínú.
 
Eré yii ní ẹ̀fẹ̀, arinrin ati ọ̀nà pípé tí wón fìí yàá. Mo fẹ́ràn rẹ gan, aṣọ àti àṣà wíwọ̀ rẹ̀ pọ lápọ̀jù.  Mo ma sọ fún àwon ènìyàn nípa rẹ̀
column4:
Super Cute Romantic awada
Fiimu yii dun gaan, alarinrin, o si ya aworan lẹwa. Mo nifẹ rẹ gaan, ati aṣọ ati aṣa jẹ afikun pupọ. Mo ṣeduro rẹ gaan.

column2: Wow! Netflix finally picked up something good.
column3: Ìyanu! ètò Netflix padá mú nkan tó dára
column4: Iro ohun! Netflix nipari gbe nkan ti o dara.

Loved it!

A wonderfully refreshing movie with humor and great acting. Could enjoy without ever having to "fasing!

Eré tí ó yanilẹ́nu pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rín àrín tàkìtì àti eré ṣíṣe tí ó dára. Mo ma gbádùn re láì nílò kí a sun síwájú
column4:
Nifẹ rẹ!

Fiimu onitura iyalẹnu pẹlu awada ati iṣere nla. Ṣe o le gbadun laisi nini lati “” fasing!

Excellent movie

Well written, loved the combination of drama and comedy. I have recommended it to friends

O tayọ fiimu

Ti kọ daradara, fẹran apapo ere ati awada. Mo ti ṣeduro rẹ si awọn ọrẹ

Mind Blowing Piece Of Work.

Enjoyed it. Been a while I saw a movie so well acted and delivered. The theme was beautifully touched on. Well done Genevieve Nnaji and Team. Looking forward to your next reviews
column3:
Iṣẹ́ tín yani lẹ́nu. 
 
Ò ti ṣe díẹ̀ tí mo  wo eré tí ó ní ìgbékalẹ̀ gidi. Genevieve Nnaji àti àwon ẹgbẹ́ rẹ kú iṣẹ́. Mo n retí àwon èsì tí n bọ̀
column4:
Okan fifun Nkan Of Work.

Idunnu re. Ni igba diẹ Mo rii fiimu kan ti o ṣiṣẹ daradara ati jiṣẹ. A fi ọwọ kan akori naa ni ẹwa. O dara Genevieve Nnaji ati Egbe. Nwa siwaju si rẹ tókàn agbeyewo

column2:
Amazing Film

Indeed the most anticipated film from Nollywood 2019 didn't disappoint. Loved it all. Well done to Genevieve and Team
column3:
Eré tí ó dára. 
 
Ní tootọ́, eré tí a ti n retí láti ọwọ́ọ Nollywood 2019 tí wọ́n òsì já wa kulẹ̀. Genevieve Nnaji àti àwon ẹgbẹ́ rẹ kú iṣẹ́.
column4:
Fiimu iyalẹnu

Lootọ fiimu ti a nireti julọ lati Nollywood 2019 ko jakulẹ. Fẹràn gbogbo rẹ. O dara si Genevieve ati Ẹgbẹ

column2:
Lionheart

Genevieve Nnaji is a seasoned actress and she proves her worth in the industry after 20 years that she is still the best with her directing debut. we only have to say well done ma
column3:
Lionheart.
 
Genevieve Nnaji jẹ́ òsèré obìrin tí ó mọ iṣẹ́ rẹ ósì ti fi ìyè rẹ hàn ní ilé iṣẹ́ naa lẹ́yìn ogún ọdún pé òhun sí ni o dára jù pẹ̀lú ìtọ̀sọ́nà àkọ́kọ́, ohun tí a le sọ ni wípé ẹkú iṣẹ́ ma.
column4:
Ọkàn Lion

Genevieve Nnaji jẹ oṣere ti igba ati pe o jẹri pe o niyelori ninu ile-iṣẹ naa lẹhin ọdun 20 pe o tun jẹ ẹni ti o dara julọ pẹlu iṣafihan iṣaju akọkọ rẹ. a nikan ni lati sọ daradara ma

column2: Genevieve Nnaji proves yet again while she's still the best Nollywood actress of all time with her directing debut. we can only say more grease
column3: Genevieve Nnaji tún fihàn lẹẹkan si wípé óun sì ni óṣèré Nollywood tí ó jáfáfá jùlọ pẹ̀lù ìtọ́sọ́nà eré alákọkọ. Ohun tí a  ni la ti  sọ nipé kí agbára naa kí ó ma pọ̀ si
column4: Genevieve Nnaji tun ṣe afihan lẹẹkansi lakoko ti o tun jẹ oṣere Nollywood ti o dara julọ ni gbogbo igba pẹlu iṣafihan oludari akọkọ rẹ. a le nikan sọ diẹ girisi

Rational representation of the Igbos

Lion heart represented what it really means to be Igbo - hard-working and communal system of living.

Okan kiniun duro fun ohun ti o tumo si nitootọ lati jẹ Igbo - sise takuntakun ati eto igbe aye.

Lionheart

Best movie for me. The comedy was spot on. Nkem owoh killed it and Genevieve just made the awesome
column3:
Lionheart
 
Erè tí mo fẹ́ràn jù lọ.  Àwàda rẹ̀ dé ibi ti o yẹ kó dé. Nkem okoh ṣe iṣẹ̀ rẹ̀ dáadáa, Genevieve síì jẹ kó dára si.
column4:
Ọkàn Lion

Ti o dara ju fiimu fun mi. Awọn awada wà iranran lori. Nkem owoh pa a ati Genevieve kan ṣe ẹru naa

column2: This movie works because of the brilliance and charisma of Pete above all... Genevieve and Nkem did exceptional as expected.
column3: Eré  ìse ti o yẹ nitori 'karisima' rẹ̀ àti ìmólẹ̀ Pete ju gbogbo rẹ̀ lo... Genevieve ati Nkem ṣe iṣẹ̀ bì a ti rò.
column4: Fiimu yii ṣiṣẹ nitori didan ati ifẹ ti Pete ju gbogbo rẹ lọ… Genevieve ati Nkem ṣe alailẹgbẹ bi o ti ṣe yẹ.

column2: Lionheart is not just a good movie that made a dent in a rusty and stagnant Nollywood industry, this is a new beginning from which the young upcoming Nigerian filmmakers and actors know it is possible to put Nigeria on the global map of film.
column3: Lionheart o ki n se eré  tí ó dára nìkan sùgbọ́n tó tún fa  Nollywood kúrò nínu pàlàpálá tí ó wa. ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ohun titun láti ibití àwon ẹgbẹ́ẹ eléré àti àwon òsèré ọ̀dọ́ tó sẹ n dàgbà mọ̀ wípé ó seése láti fi Naijiria sórí máàpù eré tí àgbáyé
column4: Lionheart kii ṣe fiimu ti o dara lasan ti o ṣe gọbọi ni ile-iṣẹ Nollywood kan ti o npa ati ti o duro, eyi jẹ ibẹrẹ tuntun lati eyi ti awọn ọdọ ti o n ṣe fiimu ati awọn oṣere Naijiria ti mọ pe o ṣee ṣe lati gbe Naijiria sori maapu fiimu agbaye.

column2:
Amazing

Loved the display if pure culture even in the music. Great to see the people who made me watch nollywood movies again. All round thrilling and very funny..
column3:
Iyanu!
Mo fẹ́ràn ìfihàn àṣà àní ninu orin. Ó dára láti rí àwon ènìyàn tí ó mú mi wo eré Nollywood lẹ́ẹ̀kan si.
Ósì mù ni rẹrin.
column4:
Iyalẹnu

Ni ife ifihan ti o ba ti funfun asa ani ninu awọn orin. O dara lati rii awọn eniyan ti o jẹ ki n wo awọn fiimu nollywood lẹẹkansi. Gbogbo yika ojlofọndotenamẹ tọn ati ki o gidigidi funny ..

column2:

column2:
Old Nollywood at Its Best

This is a simple and well told story with brilliant cinematography. Lionheart is unapologetic in its display of Nigerian culture. The movies also passes several subtle messages of leadership, parental support, strength, perseverance and peace between different tribal groups.
column3:
Eré Nollywood àtíjọ́ tí ó gba ipò àgbà
 
Eré yi jẹ eré tí ó le, tí ó si ni sinimatogirafi tó fakọjọ. Lion heart, láì fi kan pè kan jẹ eré tí ó gbé àsà Naijiria lárugẹ . Eré naa fi àwon ẹ̀kọ́ kọ́wa, tí ó dá lé lórí , ìṣèjọba, ìgbìnyànjú àwon òbí, okun, ìforítì àti ìfọ̀kànbalẹ̀ laarin àwon ẹ̀yà èdè orisirisi.
column4:
Nollywood Atijọ ni Dara julọ

column2: Lionheart is a creative gift, a joyous feet of cast ensemble, potent storyline and qualitative production. From the beautiful lead character, Genevieve Nnaji to Nkem Owoh, we feel the lives of people who maybe different from us,share a unifying tie.

Big respect to you Kunle.
column3:
Fíìmù tó lẹ́wà lọ sí inú ìtàn ọdún séyìn tí ìnira láti ọwọ àwọn olùkọ́. Ẹjó á nílò ǹkan tí ó ju ọgbọ́n wa. Kìíse àwọn Fíìmù tó sọrọ nípa Lékkí tàbí owó epo sí ìgbésí ayé. Bẹ́ẹ̀ni, àwọn ǹkan mìrán-àn le dáa sùgbọ́n eléyìí gba mẹ́wàá láti òdò mi nítorí wípé irú ǹkan tí mo fẹ́ràn láti rí kọ́ jáde nínú Eré adúláwò.
Ìgb́oríyìn ńlá fún ọ Kúnlé

Iwo nla fun iwo Kunle.

Ọpọlọpọ awọn iyin si awọn oṣere (ati awọn olupilẹṣẹ) fun fiimu ti n tu ọkan, irora wọn, ijiya, ifẹ ati awọn iṣẹgun jẹ ọkan-aya jakejado.

column2:
Awesome

The first time I saw this movie I was blown away. I don't want to sound crazy but I try to study things of this world. I hope to see a second installment with the same characters and a darker plot.
column3:
Ó LÉ KENKÀ
Nígbà tí mo kọ́kọ́ wo sinimá yìí, ó yà mí lẹ́nu gan-an ni o. N kò fẹ́ dàbí ẹni tí ó ń ronú ju bó ṣe yẹ lọ o, ṣùgbọ́n mo máa ń ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò àwọn ohun ayé yìí. Mò ń fi ojú sọ́nà fún apá kejì pẹ̀lú àwọn òșèré kan náà àti ìtàn tí yóò tún rújú ju èyí lọ.
column4:
Oniyi

Ni igba akọkọ ti Mo rii fiimu yii Mo ti fẹ. Emi ko fẹ lati dun irikuri ṣugbọn Mo gbiyanju lati kawe awọn nkan ti agbaye yii. Mo nireti lati rii diẹdiẹ keji pẹlu awọn ohun kikọ kanna ati idite dudu kan.

Amazing movie

Fíìmù tó peregedé
Láti àwọn òșèré inú rẹ̀ dórí ìtàn eré yìí, ó dára gan-an ni. Gbogbo rẹ̀ ló bára wọn mu ní șíșẹ̀ n tẹ̀lé. Kò sí bíi ọkàn yín kò ṣe ní gbé sókè sódò.

O jẹ fiimu wow, lati simẹnti si itan itan .. o nṣàn, o fun gbogbo awọn ẹdun ti o ga ati kekere .. iru fiimu ti a kọ daradara. Tọ gbogbo ogorun ..

column2: Loved It All! Awesome Actresses! Entertaining Fashionable & Educational!!! These writers and directors were so on point. This series had me begging for more. I'm a major fan of these women and men now. More, Please!
column3:
Gbogbo ọ̀nà ni mo gbà fẹ́ràn rẹ̀. Fíìmù ìgbafẹ́, tó gbé oge jáde tó sì tún kọ́ni lẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ni!!! Àwọn tí ó kọ ọ́ àti àwọn tí wọ́n darí rẹ̀ mọ ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe. Ṣe ló ń ṣe mí bíi kí ó má tán mọ́. Mo ti wàá gba ti àwọn òșèré yìí lọ kùnrin àti lóbìnrin o.
Ẹ jọ̀wọ́, ṣé mo rí ìkan síi?
column4: Nifẹ Rẹ Gbogbo! Awọn oṣere oniyi! Idaraya Asiko & Ẹkọ !!! Awọn wọnyi ni onkqwe ati oludari wà bẹ lori ojuami. Yi jara ní mi ṣagbe fun diẹ ẹ sii. Mo jẹ olufẹ pataki ti awọn obinrin ati awọn ọkunrin wọnyi ni bayi. Diẹ sii, Jọwọ!

column2:
One of the best in African drama series

The talent, top notch , such quality acting from those ladies, hands down perfect.and the script was informative and well executed.

Keep it up Nollywood you're on the right track.
column3:
Ìkan lára àwọn eré alábala ilé Adúláwò tí ó dára jù.
Ẹ̀bùn yẹn lé téńté. Ìșọwọ́ ṣeré àwọn ọmọbìnrin yẹn kún ojú òṣùwọ̀n. Bí wọ́n ṣe kọ eré náà kọ́ni lọ́gbọ́n wọ́n sì ríi ṣe.
Nọ́líwuùdù, ẹ rí èyí ṣe, ẹ máa tẹ̀ síwájú.

Talent, oke ogbontarigi , iru didara sise lati awon tara, ọwọ si isalẹ pipe.and awọn akosile wà ti alaye ati ki o daradara executed.

Jeki ni Nollywood o wa lori ọna ti o tọ.

column2:
Original

I am impressed. And I am rarely with 9ja movies/series. But am here at 1am watching this. It connects the dots. Kudos to the effort. Arese kudos.

Ojúlówó
Ó mú orí mi wú. Àwọn fíìmù Nàìjíríà kìí sábà mú orí mi wú. Aago kan òru ni mo wà tí mò ń wo fíìmù yìí lọ́wọ́. Gbogbo rẹ̀ ló bára wọn mu. Wọ́n kú ișẹ́ takuntakun. Sàdánkátà yín o.

Mo wú mi lórí. Ati ki o Mo wa ṣọwọn pẹlu 9ja sinima / jara. Sugbon mo wa nibi ni aago 1am wiwo eyi. O so awọn aami. O ṣeun si igbiyanju naa. Arese kudos.

excellent Performances~

Well done! The performances by the entire cast was good, especially the actress who plays the mother along with the male and female lead. Would definitely watch more stories like this.

o tayọ Performances ~

Kú isé! Awọn ere nipasẹ gbogbo awọn oṣere dara, paapaa oṣere ti o ṣe iya pẹlu asiwaju akọ ati abo. Yoo dajudaju wo awọn itan diẹ sii bii eyi.

column2:
Level Up!

Nollywood movies are getting up where we want it. I loved the acting, storyline & casting line-up of this movie. Its a good romcom in a Naija way!

Nice acting y' all.

Sún sókè!
Àwọn eré Nọ́líwuùdù náà tí ń wà ní ipò gíga tí ó yẹ kí wọ́n wà. Mo fẹ́ràn bí àwọn òșèré yẹn ṣe ṣe, bí ìtàn yẹn ṣe lọ, àwọn òșèré tí wón lò.

Awọn sinima Nollywood n dide ni ibi ti a fẹ. Mo nifẹ iṣe iṣere, laini itan ati laini simẹnti ti fiimu yii. O jẹ romcom ti o dara ni ọna Naija!

Ti o dara osere y' gbogbo.

column2:
I appreciate the story and all the intrigue. Sometimes i found angry but the end is beautiful. We have to decide for our life, nobody will do it for us.
I appreciate the dresses of the actor principal. She is beautiful with her braids - natural is better.
column3:
Ìtàn yẹn àti gbogbo rògbòdìyàn inú rẹ̀ ni mo fẹ́ràn.
Àwọn apá kọ̀ọ̀kan bí mi nínú ṣùgbọ́n ìgbẹ̀yìn rẹ̀ rẹwà.
A ní láti gbé ìgbésẹ̀ tí a fẹ́ fún ayé wa nítorí enì kankan kò ní báwa gbé e.
Ìșọwọ́ múra òșèré tó léwájú wù mí àti irú irun tí ó ṣe. Ẹwà àmútọ̀runwá máa ń dára.
column4:
Mo riri itan ati gbogbo intrigue. Nigba miiran Mo binu ṣugbọn opin jẹ lẹwa. A ni lati pinnu fun igbesi aye wa, ko si ẹnikan ti yoo ṣe fun wa.
Mo dupẹ lọwọ awọn aṣọ ti olori oṣere naa. O lẹwa pẹlu braids rẹ - adayeba dara julọ."

column2:
This is the nollywood evolution

This is arguably my best Nigeria movie for year 2019. I cannot find any misplaced in this movie, perfectly executed, simple and so informative about our society n thought provoking on career part for our children
column3:
Àyípadà Nọ́líwuùdù
Fún ọdún 2019 o, eléyìí fẹ́ẹ̀ ni fíìmù tí mo fẹ́ràn ju. N kò fẹ́rẹ́ rí àṣìṣe kankan nínú eré yìí. Wọ́n ríi ṣe. Ó kọ́ni lọ́gbọ́n àti òye lórí àwùjọ wá àti ișẹ́ tí ó yẹ kí àwọn ọmọ wa se.

column2:
so cool

This was so chilled. this movie was fun and enjoyable from the start. I've found no flaws to it, maybe the introduction is a little corny, but thats just taste. this movie was light but meaningful. highly recommended!
column3:
Ó mà dára o.
Láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ni sinimá yìí tí dùn. N kò tíì rí àṣìṣe kankan. Lóòótọ́, ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ rẹ̀ rí bákan àmọ́ bí wón ṣe fẹ́ kó rí nìyẹn. Ata kéré iyọ̀ dùn ún  ni fíìmù yí.
Mo gbà yín níyànjú kí ẹ lọ wò o.
column4:
"o dara

Eyi ti tutu pupọ. fiimu yii jẹ igbadun ati igbadun lati ibẹrẹ. Mo ti sọ ri ti ko si awọn abawọn si o, boya awọn ifihan jẹ kekere kan corny, sugbon ti o kan lenu. fiimu yii jẹ imọlẹ ṣugbọn o nilari. gíga niyanju!"

column2:
A very good movie with a good lesson!

This is movie is about a coming of age comedy/drama about a young boy who wants to fix things with his hands rather sit behind a cubicle. In a broader sense, I think this is just celebrating how things are done in Africa, and how kids learn to be humble.
column3:
Sinimá tí ó dára tí ó sì kọ́ni lọ́gbọ́n rere ni.
 
Sinimá yìí dá lórí ọmọ ọkùnrin kan tí ó ń dàgbà tí kò sì fẹ́ káwọ́ gbera. Tí a bá wò ó, mo wòye pé sinimá yìí ń fi bí ati ń ṣe ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwò hàn ni àti bí àwọn ọmọdé ṣe ń kọ́ bí a ti ń ní ìtẹríba.
column4:
Fiimu ti o dara pupọ pẹlu ẹkọ ti o dara!

Eyi jẹ fiimu nipa wiwa ti ọjọ ori awada / eré nipa ọmọdekunrin kan ti o fẹ lati ṣe atunṣe awọn nkan pẹlu ọwọ rẹ kuku joko lẹhin cubicle kan. Ni ọna ti o gbooro, Mo ro pe eyi n ṣe ayẹyẹ bi awọn nkan ṣe ṣe ni Afirika, ati bii awọn ọmọde ṣe kọ ẹkọ lati jẹ onirẹlẹ.”

column2:
A much needed mascarade

This is not just another naija silly film. It's still silly and Nigerian, but in a witty, essentially thought-provoking way. It's a statement. An indepth look into physical vs spiritual balance, which we're all seeking today. A fable with humble esthetics.
column3:
Bí a ṣe nílò rẹ̀ gan-an rèé
Eléyìí kìí kàn ṣe ìkan lára àwọn fíìmù arìndìn Nàìjíríà. Síbẹ̀, fíìmù Nàìjíríà náà sì ni kò sì mú ọgbọ́n dání tó ṣùgbọ́n lọ́nà kúkúrú tó lóye tó sì pè fún ìrònú jinlẹ̀. Ọ̀rọ̀ kànkàkà ni tí ó fi ojú sùnnùkùn wo ìședọ́gba láàrin ipa tẹ̀mí àti ipa tara, tí gbogbo ènìyàn ń lépa lónìí. Fààbú tí wọ́n ríṣe láì pariwo ni.
column4:
Mascarade ti o nilo pupọ

Eyi kii ṣe fiimu aṣiwere miiran nikan ni. O tun jẹ aimọgbọnwa ati orilẹ-ede Naijiria, ṣugbọn ni ọgbọn, ọna ti o ni ironu ni pataki. Gbólóhùn kan ni. Wiwo inu inu si iwọntunwọnsi ti ara vs ti ẹmi, eyiti gbogbo wa n wa loni. Arosọ kan pẹlu awọn ẹwa onirẹlẹ.”

column2:
Nigerian New Wave!

Thoroughly enjoyed the film! It was authentic, honest, absurdist, comical & inquisitive in all right ways.
And I'm looking forward to Abba's next feature!
column3:
Omi tuntun Nàìjíríà
Mo gbádùn fíìmù yìí gan-an ni o! Ògidì ni, kò sí irọ́ níbẹ̀, ó pani lẹ́rìn-ín, ó sì tún ń wádìí àwọn ohun tó ṣe kókó lọ́nà tó tọ́.
Mò ń fojú sọ́nà fún eré míràn tí Abba yóò kópa nínú rẹ̀.
column4:
“Igbi Tuntun Naijiria!

Ni kikun gbadun fiimu naa! O jẹ ojulowo, ooto, absurdist, apanilẹrin & iwadii ni gbogbo awọn ọna ti o tọ.
Ati pe Mo n reti siwaju si ẹya Abba ti o tẹle!"

column2: I enjoyed the movie, and its overall message, that was frankly superimposed at all times. but the movie had a positive and optimistic message, so i found story development and everything to be appropriate.
column3: Mo gbádùn fíìmù yìí àti ẹ̀kọ́ tó kọ́ni tí wón ń tẹpẹlẹ mọ́ ní gbogbo ìgbà. Ṣùgbọ́n ọgbọ́n gidi ló kọ́ni. Ju gbogbo rẹ̀ lọ, bí títò ìtàn yẹn ṣe lọ àti gbogbo ǹkan ló bójúmu.
column4: Mo gbadun fiimu naa, ati ifiranṣẹ gbogbogbo rẹ, ti o jẹ otitọ ni gbogbo igba. ṣugbọn fiimu naa ni ifiranṣẹ rere ati ireti, nitorinaa Mo rii idagbasoke itan ati ohun gbogbo lati jẹ deede.

column2: These people deserve a whole fucking lot of credit for this movie. The writing is eh. Performances are eh. But so, so hard, and they did it. You have to appreciate that.

column4: Awọn eniyan wọnyi yẹ fun kirẹditi pupọ fun fiimu yii. Awọn kikọ jẹ eh. Awọn iṣẹ ṣiṣe jẹ eh. Ṣugbọn bẹ, lile, nwọn si ṣe. O ni lati mọriri iyẹn.

column2: Great movie. It's a good watch. it was thoughtful and not a lot of forceful acting. It was good

column4: O jẹ fiimu ti o ni itọsọna daradara ati iṣelọpọ pẹlu akori ifura pupọ. Itan naa ti sọ daradara ati mu wa si igbesi aye pẹlu simẹnti iyalẹnu.

column2: It almost accurately portrayed the abuses a lot female students face in Nigerian universities and west Africa at large

column4: Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ jẹ́ kánjúkánjú pé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ obìnrin ń dojú kọ ní àwọn ilé ẹ̀kọ́ gíga Nàìjíríà àti ìwọ̀ oòrùn Áfíríkà lápapọ̀

column2:
Excellent Film

This was a great film. A very simple storyline that provides a glimpse into the past to two boys (with many unknowns).. then the twists and turns that surround their reunion as grown men.

Well done! So different from anything I've ever scene.
column3:
Fíìmù tó peregedé
Fíìmù dára púpọ̀. Ìtàn tí kò rújú rárá tó sọ nípa àwọn ọmọ ọkùnrin méjì pẹ̀lú ìgbésí ayé tí wọ́n ti gbé sẹ́yìn tí àwọn ènìyàn kò mọ̀. Lẹ́yìn èyí ni àwọn kòtò àti gegele tó yí bí wọ́n ṣe padà ríra wọn nígbà tí wọ́n ti dàgbà.
Ẹ kú ișẹ́. Èyí yàtọ̀ sí àwọn èyí tí mo ti ń wò tẹ́lẹ̀.

Fiimu ti o dara julọ

Eyi jẹ fiimu nla kan. Itan itan ti o rọrun pupọ ti o pese iwoye si awọn ọmọkunrin meji ti o ti kọja (pẹlu ọpọlọpọ awọn aimọ) .. lẹhinna awọn iyipo ati awọn iyipo ti o yika ipadapọ wọn bi awọn ọkunrin ti o dagba.

Kú isé! Nitorinaa yatọ si ohunkohun ti Mo ti rii tẹlẹ. ”

Terrific film!

This is an intense, heartbreaking family drama with an excellent script and stellar acting performances.

Great Tale

This is a premium movie anytime. Tells the tales of our society decay. So sad! So true!

Ìtàn ńlá nìyí.

Itan nla

Eleyi jẹ a Ere movie nigbakugba. Sọ awọn itan ti ibajẹ awujọ wa. Bẹẹ ibanuje! Ni otitọ!"

column2:
Beautiful, Captivating, Powerful, Raw

This movie captured the troubles faced by the average Gen Z Nigerian kid. It did not gloss over anything. It left you angry and annoyed at some places. It left you triggered which I think was the point. To force the viewer to live the reality of the characters. I'm happy this story got told.
column3:
Ó rẹwà, ó gbà gbogbo ọkàn, ó lágbára, ó le.
 
Fíìmù yí ṣe àfihàn gbogbo àwọn ìṣòro tí àwọn ọmọ ayé òde òní ni ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà ń kojú kò kàn fi ọwọ́ ba ohun kankan lérèfé. Yóò mú inú bí ọ làwọn ibì kọ̀ọ̀kan. Yóò ru ọ nínú sókè ní èyí tí mo rò pé ìdí tí wọ́n fi ṣe é náà nìyẹn. Láti jẹ́ kí àwọn tí ó wò ó gbé ìgbésí ayé àwọn òșèré tó kópa nínú rẹ̀. Inú mi dùn pé ìtàn yìí di sísọ.
column4:
Ẹwa, iyanilẹnu, Alagbara, Raw

Fiimu yii gba awọn wahala ti apapọ ọmọ Naijiria Gen Z dojuko. O ko didan lori ohunkohun. O jẹ ki o binu ati ki o binu ni awọn aaye kan. O fi ọ silẹ ti nfa eyiti Mo ro pe o jẹ aaye naa. Lati fi ipa mu oluwo lati gbe otito ti awọn ohun kikọ. Inu mi dun pe a sọ itan yii. ”

column2:
Amazing movie

Fíìmù tó dára yàtọ̀
 
Sinimá yí ṣe àfihàn gbogbo àwọn ìṣòro tí àwọn ọmọ ayé òde òní ni ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà ń kojú kò kàn fi ọwọ́ ba ohun kankan lérèfé. Yóò mú inú bí ọ làwọn ibì kọ̀ọ̀kan. Yóò ru ọ nínú sókè ní èyí tí mo rò pé ìdí tí wọ́n fi ṣe é náà nìyẹn. Láti jẹ́ kí àwọn tí ó wò ó gbé ìgbésí ayé àwọn òșèré tó kópa nínú rẹ̀. Inú mi dùn pé ìtàn yìí di sísọ.
column4:
"Fiimu iyanu

Fiimu yii gba awọn wahala ti apapọ ọmọ Naijiria Gen Z dojuko. O ko didan lori ohunkohun. O fi ọ silẹ ni ibanujẹ ati ibinu ni awọn aaye kan. O fi ọ silẹ ti nfa eyiti Mo ro pe o jẹ aaye naa. Lati fi ipa mu oluwo lati gbe otito ti awọn ohun kikọ. Inu mi dun pe a sọ itan yii. ”

column2:
Breathtakingly nice movie!

At first I was a bit skeptical, as I wasn't exposed to Nigerian cinema before. However, by the end of the movie (brilliantly done by the way), I realised that I witnessed an audio-visual masterpiece. Highly recommend!
column3:
Sinimá gidi tí ó ń kó àyà ẹni sókè ni
Ní àkọ́kọ́, mò ń wò ó bóyá yóò dára àbí pé ìdàkejì rẹ̀ nítorí n kò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ mọ̀ nípa àwọn sinimá Nàìjíríà tẹ́lẹ̀. Àmọ́ ní òpin fíìmù yìí (eléyìí tí wọ́n rí ṣe dáadáa), mo wá gbà pé mo ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ fojú kojú pẹ̀lú fánrán ohùn àti àwòrán tí kò ní ẹgbẹ́ ni.
Mo le è fi ọwọ́ rẹ̀ sọ àyà pé kí àwọn ènìyàn wò ó.
column4:
"Fiimu ti o wuyi pupọ!

Lákọ̀ọ́kọ́, mo máa ń ṣiyèméjì díẹ̀, níwọ̀n bí mi ò ti fara balẹ̀ wo fíìmù Nàìjíríà rí. Bí ó ti wù kí ó rí, nígbà tí fíìmù náà ti parí (tí a ṣe lọ́nà tí ó dára lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀), Mo wá rí i pé mo ti rí iṣẹ́-aṣetan tí a fi ohun-oòrin kan rí. Ṣe iṣeduro ga julọ!"

column2: This story is no fiction. The doctor who saved her country (and probably the world) from a deadly outbreak of Ebola has died from it. This very moving movie retraces what happened in Lagos in July 2014 with force and simplicity. The actors are convincing, true... It's sad, obviously, but also enriching with hope.
column3:
Ìtàn yìí kìí kàn án ṣe ìtàn àròsọ́ lásán o. Dókítà obìnrin tí ó gbà orílè-èdè rẹ̀ (àti bóyá gbogbo ayé gan-an) lọ́wọ́ àjàkálẹ̀ àrùn așekú pani Ebola fúnra rẹ̀ ti kú nípasẹ̀ àìsàn náà. Fíìmù tó fọwọ́ tọ́ ni lọ́kàn yìí sọ nípa ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ ni ìlú Èkó ni oṣù keje ọdún 2014 ní ọ̀nà gidi tí kò lè rárá.
Àwọn òșèré yẹn ṣe é bí ó ti yẹ. Ní òótọ́, ó bani lọ́kàn jẹ ṣùgbọ́n ó mú ìrètí púpọ̀ dání.
column4: Itan yii kii ṣe itan-akọọlẹ. Dọkita ti o ti fipamọ orilẹ-ede rẹ (ati boya agbaye) lati ibesile apaniyan ti Ebola ti ku lati ọdọ rẹ. Fíìmù tó wúni lórí gan-an yìí tún ṣàtúnyẹ̀wò ohun tó ṣẹlẹ̀ ní Èkó ní oṣù keje ọdún 2014 pẹ̀lú ipá àti ìrọ̀rùn. Awọn oṣere naa ni idaniloju, otitọ… O jẹ ibanujẹ, o han gedegbe, ṣugbọn tun ni imudara pẹlu ireti.

column2: This film is done at a slow, steady, believable pace. I was completely drawn into the story and connected with all the actors as if I knew them.
column3: Ìlànà ìgbín tẹnu mọ́ igi, ó gùn ún ní wọ́n fi ṣe sinimá yìí. Ó ṣe é gbàgbọ́. Gbogbo ọkàn mi ló wà lára ìtàn yìí tí ó sì dá bíi wípé mo ti mọ àwọn òșèré yẹn rí tẹ́lẹ̀ ni bí ọkàn mi ṣe fà mó wọn.
column4: A ṣe fiimu yii ni o lọra, duro, iyara ti o gbagbọ. Mo ti fa patapata sinu itan ati asopọ pẹlu gbogbo awọn oṣere bi ẹnipe Mo mọ wọn.

column2: I liked it a lot better than I tot I would. Especially the (rather timid, by Hollywood standard) sex scenes. Oh, Kanene was exactly like how I picture Chimamanda is in real life
column3:
Mo fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ kọjá bí mo ti lérò pé n ó fẹ́ràn rẹ̀ lọ.
Ní pàápàájùlọ (pé kò jo ti àgbékalẹ̀ ìdérùbani Nollywood) ti Ìran ìbálòpò.
Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àwọn àgbọn kan wà nínú ìwé náà tí ó wù mí kí ó jẹyọ nínú eré náà – nípàápàjùlọ apá èyí tí ó dá lórí àforígbárí nínú ọkọ̀ ojúurin láti Kano. Kanene rí gẹ́gẹ́ bí mó ti níran pé Chimamanda yíò tó rí lójú ayé.
column4: Mo nifẹ pupọ dara julọ ju Emi yoo lọ. Paapa awọn iwoye ibalopo (dipo itiju, nipasẹ boṣewa Hollywood). Nibẹ wà, sibẹsibẹ, diẹ ninu awọn apa ti awọn iwe ti mo fẹ ṣe si o si awọn movie - paapa ni apa abt braided ori ninu reluwe lati Kano bit. Oh, Kanene dabi bi mo ṣe ṣe aworan Chimamanda ni igbesi aye gidi

column2: Something like a Shakespearean comedy, full of highly amusing, sharply drawn characters and offering wicked insight into how identity is shaped by city living and immigrant culture clash.

column2: A mild, yet brutal, racial quandried film which can't help but, to me, recall American History X.... Kate brought me here and it was great to see her as a "regular" person.
column3: Eré tí ó le níwònba, eré tí ó níse pẹ̀lú ìsòro ẹlẹ́yàmẹyà tí kò le sàì món múmi rántí ìtàn American... Kate mú mi wá síbí ó sì jẹ́ oun ńlá láti rí gẹ́gẹ́bí èdá yòókù.
column4: A ìwọnba, sibẹsibẹ buru ju, eya quandried film eyi ti ko le ran sugbon, si mi, ÌRÁNTÍ American History X.... Kate mu mi nibi ati awọn ti o jẹ nla lati ri rẹ bi a "deede" eniyan.

column2: There is a lot of mediocre acting here and there and some things made little to no sense for me but overall i did enjoy it for what it is. I would probably not watch it ever again but seeing it once is nice.
column3: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìṣọwọ́ ṣeré tó mẹ́hẹ àti àwọn ǹkan kan tí kò mú ọpọlọ dání sí èmí ṣùgbọ́n ju gbogbo rẹ̀ lọ, mo gbádùn rẹ̀ b’óșe rí. Mo lè má tún un wò mọ́ láyé, àmọ́ ó dára ní ẹ̀ẹ̀kan tí mo wò ó yẹn.
column4: Ọpọlọpọ iṣe mediocre wa nibi ati nibẹ ati diẹ ninu awọn nkan ṣe diẹ si ko si ori fun mi ṣugbọn lapapọ Mo gbadun rẹ fun kini o jẹ. O ṣee ṣe Emi kii yoo tun wo lẹẹkansi ṣugbọn wiwo lẹẹkan dara.

column2:
Do-mi-til-la!

column4:
Ṣe-mi-til-la!

Domitilla jẹ fiimu ala-ilẹ ni ile-iṣẹ fidio ile Naijiria

column2: Entertaining live concert featuring lively arrangements of jazz and pop standards and an excellent orchestra
column3: Orin atunilára tí ó sín pẹ́pẹ́ pẹ̀lẹ́ orin jáàsì àti pọ́ọ̀pù tí ó peregedé àti ẹgbẹ́ akọrin eléré ìtàgé tí ó kún ojú òṣùwọ̀n.
column4: Idaraya ere orin laaye ti o nfihan awọn eto iwunlere ti jazz ati awọn ajohunše agbejade ati akọrin ti o dara julọ

column2: We were blessed to see 'Coming From Insanity' with a thirty something strong audience and we could literally feel their veins bursting with excitement as we were drawn closer and closer to the climax.
column3: Ìbùkún ni wíwo sinimá ‘Coming From Insanity’ pẹ̀lú àwọn olùwòran tó dáńtọ́ bíi ọgbọ̀n. Níșe là ń ríi bíi pé gbogbo iṣan wọn ló ń dìde torí wípé inú wọn dùn yàtọ̀ bí a ṣe ń sún mọ́ àgbàlá tí ó dùn jù nínú sinimá yìí.
column4: A ni ibukun fun lati rii 'Nbọ Lati Aṣiwere' pẹlu ọgbọn ohun kan ti o lagbara ti olugbo ati pe a le ni imọlara gangan ti iṣọn wọn ti nwaye pẹlu itara bi a ti n sunmo ati isunmọ si ipari.

column2: Fresh and highly entertaining, 'Who's The Boss' is the kind of Nollywood offering that brings sunshine and joy to our hearts at CinemaPointer because it shows without an iota of doubt that; Nigerians have got real film-making talent and plenty of it.
column3: Ó túni lára ó sì tún dání lára yá, Fíìmù ‘TA A L’ọ̀gá?’ jẹ́ ìkan lára àwọn fíìmù tí Nọ́líwuùdù yóò fún yín tí yóò mú ayọ̀ bá ọkàn yín nítorí ó fi hàn láìsí àní-àní pé àwọn ènìyàn Nàìjíríà ní ọpọlọ àti ẹ̀bùn fíìmù ṣíṣe tí ó pọ̀ gan-an.
column4: Titun ati igbadun pupọ, 'Tani Olori' ni iru ẹbọ Nollywood ti o mu oorun ati ayọ wa si ọkan wa ni CinemaPointer nitori pe o fihan laisi iyemeji pe; Awọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Naijiria ti ni talenti ṣiṣe fiimu ati ọpọlọpọ rẹ.

column2: Recommended!! Superbly entertaining, 'Kasanova' is a goal. Now, the story might not be completely new, but this movie is so crispy and shinny, it feels so fresh to Nollywood like a brand new toy.
column3:
Ẹ lọ wò ó! Ó dání lára yá gidi gan-an ni.
‘Kasanova’ gbayì. Ìtàn lè má jẹ́ èyí tí ojú kò rírí ṣùgbọ́n fíìmù ń kọ mọ̀nà
Ó kàn dàbí ohun ìṣeré tuntun fún Nọ́líwuùdù ni.
column4: A ṣe iṣeduro !! Idaraya to gaju, 'Kasanova' jẹ ibi-afẹde kan. Bayi, itan naa le ma jẹ tuntun patapata, ṣugbọn fiimu yii jẹ agaran ati didan, o kan rilara tuntun si Nollywood bi ohun isere tuntun.

column2: The best of the movie finds a way to abridge the novel and still allow the scenes to breathe.
column3: Ohun tí mo gbádùn nínú fíìmù yìí ni wípé ó rí ìtàn inú ìwé yẹn gé kúrú síbẹ̀ wọ́n rí gbogbo rẹ̀ ṣe.
column4: Ti o dara julọ ti fiimu naa wa ọna lati di aramada aramada ati tun gba awọn iwoye laaye lati simi.

column2: The audience's attachment to and investment in these people lend powerful intimacy to the large scale epic trappings.
column3: Bí ọkàn àwọn olùwòran ṣe fà mọ́ sinimá yìí àti pé bí wọ́n ṣe náwó lórí àwọn ènìyàn wọ̀nyí ló jẹ́ kí àwọn ènìyàn máa polongo rẹ̀.
column4: Isomọ awọn olugbo si ati idoko-owo ni awọn eniyan wọnyi ṣe awin ibaramu ti o lagbara si awọn idẹkùn apọju nla.

column2: A steamy soap opera unfolding against the backdrop of a cautionary history lesson reminding us that in Nigeria, the more things change, the more they stay insane.
column3: Fíìmù ìgbà dé gba tí ó ń șọ́ra sọ ìtàn tí ó ń kọ́ni lọ́gbọ́n tí ó sì ń rán wa létí pé ní Nàìjíríà bí àyípadà ṣe ń dé náà ni gbogbo ǹkan ń dàrú sí i.
column4: Opera ọṣẹ ọṣẹ ti n ṣipaya lodisi ẹhin ti ẹkọ itan-iṣọra kan ti n ran wa leti pe ni Naijiria, bi awọn nkan ṣe n yipada diẹ sii ni wọn maa n ya were.

column2: Hand-held camera chases, emotionally fraught close-ups, arresting compositions and a script that gives a familiar story a distinctly African flavor make "Òlòtūré" a thriller you not only endure but marvel over and embrace.
column3: Àwọn àbí tí wọ́n fi kámẹ́rà àmúlọ́wọ́, àwọn abala tí ó tọ́ ni lọ́kàn, àpilẹ̀kọ tó gbọkàn kan àti ìkọ̀tàn tí ó fún ìtàn tí a ti mọ ní àwọn àmúyẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwò ló jẹ́ kí ‘Oloture’ jẹ́ sinimá tó lágbára tí o ò kàn ní rọ́jú wò ṣùgbọ́n tí yóò yà ọ́ lẹ́nu tí o ó sì fẹ́ràn.
column4: Kamẹra ti a fi ọwọ mu, awọn isunmọ ti ẹdun, imudani awọn akopọ ati iwe afọwọkọ kan ti o funni ni itan ti o faramọ ni adun Afirika ni pato jẹ ki “Ọlọturé” jẹ ayanmọ kan o ko farada nikan ṣugbọn iyalẹnu rẹ ki o gba mọra.

column2: This was a good write, a good direct, a great watch, marvellous delivery, an elegant cast, a tasty plot!!!

Finally, a good one

column2: I found this to be a very good movie. I haven't read the novel on which it's based, but I'd like to. I hope that Bandele turns out more movies.
column3: Mo ri eleyi gegebi ere ti o dara gan. Mi o ti ka iwe to ere naa dale lori sugbon maa fe lati ka. Mo nireti pe Bandele yio tun gbe ere miiran jade si.
column4: Mo rii pe eyi jẹ fiimu ti o dara pupọ. Mi o ti ka iwe aramada ti o da lori, sugbon mo fe. Mo nireti pe Bandele wa awọn fiimu diẹ sii.

column2: Powerful film of a totally forgotten episode in history; not for the faint of heart.
column3: Eré alágbára tí agbọn ìtàn tí a ti gbàgbé . Èyí kìí ṣe fún àwọn tí kò ní àyà.

column2:
Love at war

Two couples survive the woes of war in Biafra. Film for TV but with a complicated history. The war is not shown to be very bloody.
column3:
Ìfẹ́ lójú ogun
Tọkọ taya méjì bọ́ nínú làásìgbò ogun abẹ́lẹ́ (Biafra). Fíìmù tí ó ṣe é máa wò lórí móhùnmáwòrán ṣùgbọ́n ìtàn rẹ̀ rújú. Wọ́n kò jẹ́ kí ó dàbíi wípé ogun yẹn burú jáì.
column4:
Ifẹ ni ogun

Tọkọtaya meji la wahala ogun ni Biafra. Fiimu fun TV ṣugbọn pẹlu itan idiju. Ogun naa ko han pe o jẹ ẹjẹ pupọ. ”

column2:
A film set in Africa about Africans - a nice change.

It was refreshing to see a film set in Africa which was about the African people of today rather than the great white hunter and the colonial era
column3:
Fíìmù tí a pilẹ̀ ṣe ni Áfíríkà lórí àwọn ará Áfíríkà ni. Ìyàtọ̀ tí ó dára.
Ó tú ni lára láti wo fíìmù tí wọ́n ṣe ní ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà tí ó sì dá lórí àwọn ènìyàn Áfíríkà ti òde òní yàtọ̀ fún ògbójú ọdẹ òyìnbó àti ìgbà ìmúnisìn
column4:

The story is nothing we haven't seen before but its told from a Nigerian perspective, its funny, quirky and the dialogue is great when compared with others available in the Nigerian market.

I totally enjoyed the movie, would definitely recommend (to my Naija folks!).
column3:
Kìí se pé ìtàn yí jẹ́ èyí tí ojú kò rírí ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀nà ìṣọwọ́ ronú tí Nàìjíríà ni wọ́n fi kọ ọ́. Ó pani lẹ́rìn-ín, kò múná d’óko tó àti pé ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ inú rẹ̀ dára jù àwọn èyí tí a tún lè rí rà ní ọjà Nàìjíríà.
Mo gbádùn fíìmù yẹn gan-an ni, máà rí I pé mo sọ fún àwọn tèmi ní Nàìjíríà kí wọ́n wò ó.
column4:
“Itan naa kii ṣe nkan ti a ko tii ri tẹlẹ bikòṣe pe a sọ rẹ̀ lati oju-iwoye Naijiria, ẹrinrin rẹ̀, alailaanu ati ifọrọwerọ naa dara nigba ti a ba fiwera pẹlu awọn miiran ti o wa ni ọja Naijiria.

Mo gbadun fiimu naa patapata, dajudaju Emi yoo ṣeduro (fun awọn eniyan Naija mi!)."

column2: One of the best Nollywood movies of the past decade!
column3: Okan lara awon ere Nolliwodu ti o peregede lati bi odun mewa seyin.
column4: Ọkan ninu awọn fiimu Nollywood ti o dara julọ ti ọdun mẹwa sẹhin!

Remarkable

Citation is a blend of artistry work and talented personas

Ó ga jù
Fíìmù ‘Citation’ jẹ́ àlọ̀pọ̀ ișẹ́ ọpọlọ àti àwọn òșèré tí ó ní ẹ̀bùn púpọ̀.

O yanilenu

Itọkasi jẹ idapọ ti iṣẹ iṣẹ ọna ati awọn eniyan abinibi”

column2: Citation delivers on giving us a logical representation of what happens in the real world to a large percentage of the youth, particularly students, and more particularly those of the female gender.
column3: CITATION ṣe àfihàn ohun tí ó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ sí èyí tí ó pọ̀jú nínú àwọn ọ̀dọ́ wa, pàápàá àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti pàápàá àwọn tí ó jẹ́ obìnrin.
column4: Itọkasi jiṣẹ lori fifun wa ni aṣoju ọgbọn ti ohun ti o ṣẹlẹ ni agbaye gidi si ipin nla ti ọdọ, paapaa awọn ọmọ ile-iwe, ati ni pataki julọ ti akọ-abo obinrin.

column2:
Don't listen to this negative feedback

I’ve noticed some people can't handle the truth so they have to make up lies this is a great film not everything is true in the film but Adewale has said that but the old Tilbury skins are just jealous .... Take the film for what it is and understand life was bad in the 70s 80s for a lot of people enjoy the film and don't listen to this bad criticism.
column3:
Máṣe tẹ́tísí èsì òdì yìí
 
 Mo ti wòye àwọn kan kò le mú òótọ́ mú kí wọ́n parọ́ irọ́ ni fíìmù ńlá kìí ṣe òótọ́ oun gbogbo nínú fíìmù ṣùgbọ́n Adéwálé ti sọ béè sùgbọ́n awo Tilbury àtijó jowú lásán.... Mú fíìmù fún oun tí ó jẹ́ kí ó sì yé ayé jẹ́ búburú ní ayé e ‘70 ati ‘80 fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn gbádùn àwọn fíìmù àti kí ó kọ́ fetí sí yìí búburú lódì.
column4:
“Maṣe tẹtisi esi odi yii

Mo ti woye awon kan ko le mu ooto mu ki won paro iro ni fiimu nla kii se ooto ohun gbogbo ninu fiimu sugbon Adewale ti so bee sugbon awo Tilbury atijo jowu lasan.... Take the fiimu fun ohun ti o jẹ ati oye igbesi aye buru ni awọn ọdun 70s 80 fun ọpọlọpọ eniyan gbadun fiimu naa ati pe ko tẹtisi ibawi buburu yii. ”

column2:
GREAT MOVIE: The very best this year 2020.

The characters weré real and brutally compelling. The idea that the skin head gang werén't portrayed in true light is flawed and in no way detracts from how good this movie really is. Dramatization as a function of theater was a bit exaggerated or twisted to buttress the rawness of the story and that's excusable.
column3:
FÍÌMÙ ŃLÁ: Ó dára jùlọ ní ọdún 2020 yìí.
 
 Àwọn ipa tí àwọn òṣeré náà kó dàbíenipé tòótó ni.  Èrò náà pé àwọn ẹgbẹ́ oníjàgídíjàgan kò ṣàfihàn rẹ̀ ní ìmọ́lẹ̀ tòótọ́ jẹ́ àbùkù, kò sì sí oun tí ó lè sọ bí fíìmù yìí ṣe dára tó.  Ìṣesí wọn nípasè eré ìtàgé jẹ́ dà bí enipé àbùmọ́ wa nibe, tí ò síì dàbíẹnipé wọ́n lọ́ọ pọ̀ láti jẹ́ kí ó bá ìtàn eré nàa lọ, ó sì yéyàn.
column4:
“FIIMU NLA: O dara julọ ni ọdun yii 2020.

Awọn kikọ wà gidi ati ki o brutally ọranyan. Ọ̀rọ̀ náà pé àwọn ẹgbẹ́ oníjàgídíjàgan ti awọ ara ni a kò fi hàn ní ìmọ́lẹ̀ tòótọ́ jẹ́ àléébù àti pé kò sí ọ̀nà kan tí ó lè sọ bí fíìmù yìí ṣe dára tó. Dramatization gẹgẹbi iṣẹ ti itage jẹ arosọ diẹ tabi yiyi lati da aibikita itan naa duro ati pe o jẹ awawi.”

column2:
So relatable for Africans in the diaspora

Spoke to my own experience if being a African not living in Africa and trying so  to find belonging in a new home. Fantastic film!
column3: O ye awon adulawo to wa ni oke okun daradara. O so nipa iririi mi gege bi adulawo ti ko gbe nile adulawo ti o si n gbiyanju lati wa ibugbe miiran.
column4:
“Nitorinaa ibaramu fun awọn ọmọ Afirika ni ilu okeere

Sọ fun iriri ti ara mi ti o ba jẹ ọmọ Afirika ti ko gbe ni Afirika ati igbiyanju bẹ lati wa ohun ini ni ile titun kan. fiimu ikọja!

"

column2:
Wow, this true story! Wow! Amazing

Wow this story! The many many many stories of the Black experience throughout the African diaspora, and throughout generations. I am so glad our Brotha shared his story and got to write, direct, star in. And Damson wow, his acting is always amazing.
column3:
Itan tooto yii! O le kenka
 
Ìtàn ńlá ni ìtàn yìí. Ìtan ìrírí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọmọ adúláwò tí ó wá ní òkè òkun láti ìgbà ìwáṣẹ̀. Inú mi dùn pé arákùnrin wa sọ ìtan tirè, tí ó sì kọ ọ, darí, tí ò tún kópa nínú síṣe rẹ̀. Isé eré Damson dára púpọ̀.
column4:
"Wow, itan otitọ yii! Wow! Iyalẹnu

Iro ohun itan yii! Awọn ọpọlọpọ awọn ọpọlọpọ awọn ọpọlọpọ awọn itan ti awọn Black iriri jakejado African diaspora, ati jakejado iran. Inu mi dun pupọ pe Brotha pin itan rẹ ati ni lati kọ, taara, irawọ sinu. Ati Damson Iro ohun, iṣe iṣe rẹ jẹ iyalẹnu nigbagbogbo. ”

column2:
People will never learn if they don't even try.

This movie tackles so many issues including the biggest one of all. Identity Crisis in Black men.
column3:
Awon eniyan ko ni kekoo ti won ko ba gbiyanju nkan.
 
Eré yìí fi oríṣii ìṣòro hàn, pàápàá jùlọ, èyí tó ṣe pabambàrì èyí tí ó jẹ mọ̣́ ìpòrúru ipò àwọn aláwọ̀ dúdú ní àwùjọ
column4:
“Awọn eniyan kii yoo kọ ẹkọ ti wọn ko ba gbiyanju paapaa.

Fiimu yii koju ọpọlọpọ awọn ọran pẹlu eyiti o tobi julọ ninu gbogbo. Idaamu idanimọ ni awọn ọkunrin dudu."

column2:
Great film

I worked on this film. I don't normally watch films I've worked on but this was amazing top man ade John
column3:
Fíìmù nla
 
 Mo ṣiṣ̣ẹ́ lóri fíìmù yìí.  Mi ò kìí sába wo àwọn eré tí mo bá ti ṣiṣẹ́ lórí won-on rí, ṣùgbón èyí yanílẹ́nu. Ade John kúusé.
column4:
Fiimu nla

Mo ṣiṣẹ lori fiimu yii. Emi kii ṣe deede wo awọn fiimu ti Mo ti ṣiṣẹ lori ṣugbọn eyi jẹ iyanu ọkunrin oke ade John.

column2:
Story line on point

Really love the drama, suspense and how the Nigerian culture was portrayed. It flowed really good. Genevieve Nnaji was really spectacular. The court proceedings was very realistic. Not sure why the previous reviewer gave it a 6star. Must have had a bad day. Really enjoyed every bit. Good job team.
column3:
Itan naa dara pupo
 
Mo nife eré itage naa, ifokansona ati bi won se gbe awon asa at ise Naijiria jade. O dara, o si lo geerége. Genevieve Nnaji tún dára lónà tó yanilẹ́nu. Àwọn ẹjọ́ ilé ejó náà dábii tòótọ́. Mi ò mo ìdí tí alágbèéyẹ̀wọ̀ tó ṣe ti tẹ́lẹ̀ fi fún-un ní ìwòn méfà. Bóyá ọjọ́ burúkú kan èṣù gbomimu ló jéé fun-un,
column4:
Laini itan lori aaye

Looto ni ife eré, ifura ati bi aṣa Naijiria ṣe ṣe afihan. O ṣàn gan ti o dara. Genevieve Nnaji jẹ́ àgbàyanu gan-an. Awọn ẹjọ ile-ẹjọ jẹ ohun ti o daju pupọ. Ko daju idi ti oluyẹwo iṣaaju fun ni irawọ 6 kan. Gbọdọ ti ni ọjọ buburu kan. Gan gbadun gbogbo bit. Ẹgbẹ iṣẹ to dara.

column2:
Beautiful movie depicting historic events in Benin kingdom

This movie was very educational and interésting to watch. I am still in shock it was done in 2014. The acting and directing was superb
Kudos to the cast and crew.
column3:
Eré aladidun ti o ni awon isele itan Benin Kingdom ninu.
Ére yìí kọ́nilékọ̀ọ́ púpọ̀, ó sì dùn-ùn ní wíwò. Ó sì yàmílẹ́nu wípé ọdún 2014 ni wọ́n ṣe é. Ìṣe eré náà àti dídarí rẹ̀ dára gaan gidi.
 
Ìgbóríyìn fún àwọn tó kópa nínú síse eré náà.
column4:
Fiimu ẹlẹwa ti n ṣe afihan awọn iṣẹlẹ itan ni ijọba Benin

Fiimu yii jẹ ẹkọ pupọ ati iwunilori lati wo. Mo tun wa ni iyalẹnu ti o ṣe ni ọdun 2014. Iṣe iṣere ati itọsọna jẹ dara julọ
O ṣeun si awọn oṣere ati awọn atukọ. ”

column2: Well the movie is bad, but the story kept me watching until the end, which a I cannot say for a lot of new big production movies.

column4: O dara fiimu naa buru, ṣugbọn itan naa jẹ ki n wo titi di ipari, eyiti Emi ko le sọ fun ọpọlọpọ awọn fiimu iṣelọpọ nla tuntun.

A  must watch

I loved this film it was so funny & romantic Simply brilliant

column2:
A must see for everyone

Namaste wahala is a masterpiece and officially a cross between cultures. This Nollywood Bollywood collaboration have everything in a good romantic movie should have, the indian actors weré all great and played their roles perfectly.
column3:
Àgbọ̣dọ̣ rì fún gbogbo ènìyàn
 
 Namaste wahala jẹ̣́ ọ̀gá nínú àwọn eré, ó sì kó orísìí àṣà papọ̀. Ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ Nollywood àti Bollywood yìí ni gbgogbo oun tí eré ìfẹ́ tó bá dára máa ní. Àwọn òṣèré tí ó jẹ́ ọmọ India fakọyọ, wọ́n sì kọ́ ipa wọn dáradára
column4:
"A gbọdọ rii fun gbogbo eniyan

Namaste wahala jẹ afọwọṣe afọwọṣe ati agbekọja ni ifowosi laarin awọn aṣa. Ifowosowopo Nollywood Bollywood yii ni ohun gbogbo ninu fiimu ifẹ ti o dara yẹ ki o ni, awọn oṣere India jẹ gbogbo nla ati ṣe ipa wọn ni pipe. ”

column2:
Good watch
Nigerian Nollywood movie is on the next level, nice storyline..
column3:
Eré tó dára fún wíwò
 
Eré Nollywood Nàìjíríà ti gun òkè àjà. Ìtàn tó dára.
column4:
Aṣọ to dara
Fiimu Nollywood Naijiria ti wa ni ipele ti o tẹle, itan itan dara..

column2:
Love it!
I love the movie, the actors , the director etc. Everyone absolutely made it great with their acting skill

Anyone who finds it bad doesn't clearly know a good movie, and possibly can't relate with our cultures.
column3:
Fẹ́ràn rẹ̀!
 
Mo fẹ́ràn eré sinimá nàá, àwọn òṣèré, olùdarí, àti bẹ́ẹ̀bẹ́ẹ̀lọ. Gbogbo ènìyàn lo jé kí ó dára púpọ̀ pẹ̀lú eré ṣíṣé wọn.
Dájúdájú, ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá so wípé kò dára ò mọ fíìmù gidi, tàbí kí àṣà àwọn elòmíràn má nítumò síi.
column4:
"Nife re!
Mo nifẹ fiimu naa, awọn oṣere, oludari ati bẹbẹ lọ. Gbogbo eniyan jẹ ki o jẹ nla pẹlu ọgbọn iṣere wọn

Ẹnikẹni ti o ba rii pe ko dara ko mọ fiimu ti o dara, ati pe o ṣee ṣe ko le ni ibatan pẹlu awọn aṣa wa. ”

column2: I don't know on what basis people have given this movie such a low rating but believe me after a long time I've a watched such a good, cute, clean and better than Bollywood movie.
column3: Mi ò mọ ìdí tí àwọn èèyàn fi ń fún fíìmù yìí ní òṣùwọ̀n tó kéré. Ṣùgbọ́n tí e ó bàá gbàmígbọ́, ó ti pé tí mo ti wo eré tó dára tó báyìí, tí ó sí tún dára ju eré Bollywood lọ.
column4: Emi ko mọ lori kini awọn eniyan ti fun fiimu yii ni iwọn kekere ṣugbọn gbagbọ mi lẹhin igba pipẹ Mo ti wo iru ti o dara, wuyi, mimọ ati dara julọ ju fiimu Bollywood lọ.

column2:
Heartwarming, good natured film

Appreciated the message about the universality of love and the way the film goes on to show the value of the protagonist in a professional, moral capacity as well as a her beauty.
column3:
Ó múnú ẹni dùn, eré tí ó dára.
 
Mo gbóríyìn fún ẹ̀kọ́ nípa bí ìfé ṣe jé ǹkan gbogboogbò àti bí eré náà ṣe gbé iṣẹ́ olú òsèré náà yọ pèlú ìwà àti ẹwà rẹ ẹ̀.
column4:
Idunnu, fiimu ti o dara

Mo mọrírì ifiranṣẹ naa nipa gbogbo agbaye ti ifẹ ati ọna ti fiimu naa ṣe tẹsiwaju lati ṣafihan iye ti protagonist ni alamọdaju, agbara iwa bi daradara bi ẹwa rẹ. ”

column2: My first Nigerian Drama, this drama is more than a differént race movie. The movie also dealt with the abuse that women face even though it was supposed to be a side note. The message came out clear and concise. Absolutely loved this drama.
column3: Eré Nàìjíríà àkọ́kọ́ mi, eré yìí ju fíìmù ẹ̀yà mìíràn lọ.  Eré náà sọ nípa ìbàjẹ́ tí àwọn obìrin máa ń rí bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé kìí ṣe òun ló yẹ kó jẹ́ kókó ìtàn náà. Ẹ̀kọ́ náà jáde dáadáa, o sì yéni yékéyéké. Mo fẹ́ràn eré yìí gan púpò.
column4: Àwòkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ Nàìjíríà àkọ́kọ́ mi, eré yìí ju fíìmù eré ìje tí ó yàtọ̀ lọ. Fiimu naa tun ṣe pẹlu ilokulo ti awọn obinrin koju paapaa botilẹjẹpe o yẹ ki o jẹ akọsilẹ ẹgbẹ kan. Ifiranṣẹ naa jade kedere ati ṣoki. Egba fẹràn eré yii.

column2: Thank you for a perfect example of how HE works in our lives: This movie is a gut-wrencher, reminding us how He works through imperfect, repentant people who are only called to obey Him. He does the rest. He is faithful to complete what He has started. What a GOD honoring movie, showing the Triune in goodness and glory and power. Thank you.
column3: Ẹ ṣeun fún àpẹrẹ́ tí ẹ ṣe nípa bí Ó ti ṣe ń ṣiṣé nínú ayé e wa. Eré yìí ṣí ni lórí, ó rán wa létí bí ó ti máa ń ṣiṣé nípasè ẹ àwọn tí kò jẹ́ pípé tí wọ́n sì ní ìrònúpìwàdà tí wọ́n jẹ́ àwọn tí a pè láti gbọ́rọ̀ síi lẹ́nu. Òun ló ń ṣèyókù. Yóò parí iṣé tí ó ti bèrè. Eré tí ó bu ọlá fún ọlórun, tí ó sì ń fi oore, ògo, àti agbára métalọ́kan hàn. Ẹ ṣé púpọ̀.
column4: O ṣeun fun apẹẹrẹ pipe ti bii O ṣe n ṣiṣẹ ninu awọn igbesi aye wa: fiimu yii jẹ olutẹtisi ikun, n leti wa bi O ṣe n ṣiṣẹ nipasẹ awọn eniyan alaipe, awọn eniyan ironupiwada ti a pe lati gbọ tirẹ nikan. O ṣe awọn iyokù. O jẹ olododo lati pari ohun ti O ti bẹrẹ. Ohun ti Olorun ola movie, fifi awọn Metalokan ni oore ati ogo ati agbara. E dupe.

column2:
It was a 2hours movie that I rather shouldn't call entertainment but a moment of empowerment. If I was having doubts, my conviction got better... I was able to connect with the movie because obviously, I have experienced a touch of God before.

I say "yes" again to God's call.
column3:
Eré náà jẹ́ eré oní wákàtí méjíì tí mi ò ní pè ní ìgbádùn ṣùgbọ́n ó jẹ́ àkókò ìrónilágbára. Tí mo bá ń ṣiyèméjì, ìgbàgbó mi tún ti lékan si… Eré náà yé mi dáadáa nítoripé ó dájú pé olórun ti fọwọ́ tó mi rí.
 
Mo tún jẹ́ ìpè ọlọ́run léékàn si.
column4:
"O jẹ fiimu 2hours kan ti Emi kuku ko yẹ ki o pe ere idaraya ṣugbọn akoko agbara kan. Ti Mo ba ni iyemeji, idalẹjọ mi dara ... Mo ni anfani lati sopọ pẹlu fiimu naa nitori o han gedegbe, Mo ti ni iriri ifọwọkan ti Olorun saju.

Mo sọ ""bẹẹni"" lẹẹkansi si ipe Ọlọrun."

column2:
Speechless;

This movie gave me goose bumps I connected in a way that literally tore my soul. Indeed depicted God the way and manner it should God bless the writer, producers and all involved. The actors too are top top everyone did a fantastic job.
column3:
Ó gbenután
 
Eré yìí wọ akínyẹmí ara mìi lọ. Mo bá eré náà lọ tọkàntọkàn. Lóòtọ́ọ́, ó fi ọlọ́run hàn lónà tó yẹ. Olórun yóò bùkún olùkọ̀tàn náà, àwọn olùgbéjáde, àti gbogbo àwọn tó kópa pátápátá. Àwọn òsèré náà kò gbéyìn, gbogbo ènìyàn ló ṣe iṣé tó dára.
column4:
"Laisi ọrọ;

Fiimu yii fun mi ni awọn ọfin gussi ti mo sopọ ni ọna ti o fa ẹmi mi ya. Lootọ ṣe afihan Ọlọrun ni ọna ati ọna ti o yẹ ki Ọlọrun bukun onkọwe, awọn olupilẹṣẹ ati gbogbo awọn ti o kan. Awọn oṣere paapaa ga julọ gbogbo eniyan ṣe iṣẹ ikọja kan. ”

column2:
Best Christian Movie!!!

I love this movie! It's so well done - The acting was awesome and the storyline was refreshing. Kudos to the entire cast and crew! Definitely a must-watch!

P. S. You'll need tissues.
column3:
Fíìmù krììstẹ́nì tí ó dára jùlọ̣ !!!
 
 Mo fẹ́ràn eré yìí! Wọ́n ṣe é dáradára. Eré ṣíṣe náà kọjá àfẹnusọ, ìtàn náà sì dára. Ìgbóríyìn fún àwọn òsèré àti àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tó kópa nínú ṣíṣe eré náà. Dájúdájú àgbọdọ̀ wò ni.
 
Ṣùgbọ́n, wàá nílò ǹkan ìnujú.
column4:
"Fiimu Kristiẹni ti o dara julọ !!!

Mo nifẹ fiimu yii! O ti ṣe daradara - iṣe iṣe jẹ oniyi ati pe itan itan jẹ onitura. Kudos si gbogbo simẹnti ati atuko! Ni pato gbọdọ-ṣọ!

P.S. Iwọ yoo nilo awọn tisọ."

column2:
Beyond a movie, best ever, so much depth

One of the best movies ever.

So much depth on life, living, grief, faith, doubt, fear, winning, failing and hope.

I actually cried! For someone like me to cry, it must be seriousssss😌😅

Congratulations to the team, you created something truly spectacular!
column3:
Ó ju fíìmù lọ, ó dára jù, ó jinlẹ̀ púpọ̀
 
 Ọ̣̀kan nínú àwọ̣n fíìmù tí ó dára jùlọ.
 
 Ó jinlẹ̀ púpọ̀ lóríi ayé, ìgbésí ayé, ìbànújẹ́, ìgbàgbọ́, iyèméjì, ìbẹ̀rù, bíborí, kíkùnà àti ìrètí.
 
 Mo sunkún!  Fún ẹnìkan bíi tèmi láti sunkún, ǹkan tó lágbára ni
 
 Ìgbóríyìn fún ẹgbẹ́ tó gbé e jáde, Ẹ ṣe ǹkan ti ìyàlẹ́nu gaan!
column4:
"Ni ikọja fiimu kan, ti o dara julọ lailai, ijinle pupọ

Ọkan ninu awọn fiimu ti o dara julọ lailai.

Ijinle pupọ lori igbesi aye, igbesi aye, ibinujẹ, igbagbọ, iyemeji, iberu, bori, ikuna ati ireti.

Mo ti sọkun gangan! Fun enikan bi emi lati kigbe, o gbodo se serioussss😌😅

Ku oriire si ẹgbẹ naa, o ṣẹda nkan ti iyalẹnu gaan! ”

column2:
Uplifting, inspirational, beautiful movie.

My husband chose this movie and I didn't want to watch it. But I became totally sucked in and couldn't leave the room. The story of Sade is sad, but all that she goes through brings healing to her broken heart and changes her life in a meaningful and positive way. My husband and I both loved this movie!
column3:
Ìgbéga, ìwúnilórí, fíìmù tó dára.
 
Ọ̣kọ mìi ló yan eré sinimá yìí, mi ò sì fẹ́ wò ó. Ṣùgbọ́n ó mú mi mọ́lè tó jẹ́ wípé mi ò le kúrò nínú yàrá. Ìtàn Ṣadé banínínújé, ṣùgbọ́n gbogbo oun tí ó là kọjá mú ìtùnú bá a tí ó sì yí ayé rẹ̀ padà sí èyí tó nítumọ̀ ní ònà tó dáa. Èmi àti ọkọ mi fẹ́ràn eré yìí
column4:
Igbega, iwunilori, fiimu ẹlẹwa.

Ọkọ mi yan fiimu yii ati pe Emi ko fẹ lati wo. Sugbon mo di nibe fa mu ni ati ki o ko le kuro ni yara. Itan Sade jẹ ibanujẹ, ṣugbọn gbogbo ohun ti o kọja ni o mu iwosan wa si ọkan ti o bajẹ ati yi igbesi aye rẹ pada ni ọna ti o ni itumọ ati ti o dara. Èmi àti ọkọ mi nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí fíìmù yìí!”

column2:
Wonderful story

The movie has a lot of moral lessons. Great role interpretation by Zainab Balogun. If you have lost your way, this movie all you need to re-direct your path to God.
column3:
Ìtàn tó lágbára 
 
Eré yìí ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ nínú. Zainab Balogun túmò ipa náà dáadáa. Tí o bá ti sọnù, ǹkan tí o nílò ni eré yìí, yóò sì tọ́ ẹ sónà padà sí ìlànà ọlọ́run.
column4:
"Itan iyanu

Fiimu naa ni ọpọlọpọ awọn ẹkọ iwa. Itumọ ipa nla nipasẹ Zainab Balogun. Ti o ba ti padanu ọna rẹ, fiimu yii ni gbogbo ohun ti o nilo lati tun-darí ọna rẹ si Ọlọrun."

column2:
Saw the Premieré in Houston Texas

This movie should win an Oscar Award. The Storyline is so good. The Actors weré all incredible.
column3:
Mo wo àkọ́kọ́ ìgbéjáde rẹ̀ ní Houston Texas
 
Ó yẹkí fíìmù yìí gba Oscar Award. Ìtàn eré náà dára púpọ̀. Gbogbo àwọn òṣèré rẹ ló fakọyọ.
column4:
Ri Premieré ni Houston Texas

Fiimu yii yẹ ki o gba Aami Eye Oscar kan. Awọn Storyline jẹ ki o dara. Gbogbo awọn oṣere naa jẹ iyalẹnu.”

column2:
THE BEST MOVIE. EVER.

Things Fall Apart is the BEST movie ever. Even better than The Force Awakens. It should have won at least 5 Oscars. Okonkwo is the sexiest man I've ever seen, and everyone I've met who have seen him desire him.
column3:
Eré Sinimá tó dára jù lọ
 
Things Fall Apart jẹ́ eré tó dára jù. Kódà, ó dáa ju The Force Awakens lọ. Ó yẹ kí ó ti gba Oscar márùn-ún, ó kéré tán. Òkónkwo jẹ́ okùnrin tí ó wuni jù tí mo ti ríí, béè sì nìyí, gbogbo àwọn tí mo ti pàdé tí wón ti ríi rí nífèé rè.
column4:
"OMO OLOHUN TO DAJU.

Ohun Fall Apart ni BEST movie lailai. Ani dara ju The Force awakens. O yẹ ki o gba o kere ju 5 Osika. Okonkwo ni ọkunrin ti o ni ibalopọ julọ ti Mo ti rii tẹlẹ, ati pe gbogbo eniyan ti Mo pade ti o ti rii i ni ifẹ rẹ.”

column2:
A must watch

A cute movie,seye had qualities of what any woman will want...and if you want to watch something with the girl's I'll recommend this one.a decent movie that one can watch with they family.
column3:
Àgbọ̣dọ̀ wò
 
Eré tó dára. Seye ní àwọn iwa tí ó jẹ́ pẹ́ gbogbo obìnrin ni yóò fẹ́ ẹ…Tí ó bà sí fé wo ǹkan pẹ̀lú ti obìnrin, màá gbà ọ́ níyànjú kí o wo èleyí.  Eré tó bójúmu fún èèyàn láti wò pẹ̀lú ẹbí ni.
column4:
"A gbọdọ wo

Fiimu ti o wuyi, Seye ni awọn agbara ti ohun ti obinrin yoo fẹ… ati pe ti o ba fẹ wo nkan pẹlu ọmọbirin naa Emi yoo ṣeduro ọkan yii. fiimu ti o dara ti eniyan le wo pẹlu idile wọn.

Underrated masterpiece

Probably one of the best movies I've seen and is definitely a classic like The Godfather imo definitely is a much watch movie

column2: Realistic, entertaining and all round good vibes. I could watch it all day. I wish they would air more than once a week though, asides from that, its just great. Most reality shows come off as scripted but not this one.
column3: Ojúlówó, ìdánilárayá àti ìmọ̀lára dídára.  Mo le fi gbogbo ọjọ́ wò ó. Ó wù mí kí wọ́n gbé e jáde síi ju ẹ̀kan lọ́sè lọ. Yàtọ̀ sí èyíinì, ó kàn sáa dára púpò ni. Òpò nínú àwọn eré olótìtọ́ọ́ jẹ́ èyí tí wọ́n máa ń kó kí wọ́n tó ṣe é, ṣùgbọ́n, èyí kọ́.
column4: Ojulowo, idanilaraya ati gbogbo awọn gbigbọn ti o dara yika. Mo le wo ni gbogbo ọjọ. Mo fẹ pe wọn yoo ṣe afẹfẹ diẹ sii ju ẹẹkan lọ ni ọsẹ kan botilẹjẹpe, ni afikun si iyẹn, o kan jẹ nla. Pupọ awọn ifihan otitọ wa ni pipa bi akọwe ṣugbọn kii ṣe eyi.

eré yìi ́jé eré tó dára púpọ̀ ó sì wù mí tí ó bá tẹ̀síwájú. Ẹ jọ̀wọ́, ìgbà wo ni ìpín kẹẹ̀ta àti ẹ̀kẹẹ̀rin yóò jáde?

A must watch

Fantastic documentary, funny and emotional - strikes excellent balance between buddy's internal struggle and charms of nollywood.

Àgbọdọ̀ wò
 
Ìwé ìtàn tí ó jọjú, apanilérìn-ín, ó sì ní ẹ̀dùn ara – ó fi ìwọ̀ntunwọ̀nsì hàn nínú ìtìraka Buddy àti àwọn isé dídára a Nollywood
column4:

Iwe itan ikọja, ẹrin ati ẹdun - kọlu iwọntunwọnsi to dara julọ laarin Ijakadi inu ọrẹ ati awọn ifaya ti nollywood. ”

column2:
Great movie

The movie makes you feel every emotion which is a great marker for a great movie. It made me laugh, cry and filled with suspense on what will happen next. The production of the movie is A1 and the cast did a great job in portraying their characters. I enjoyed every second of it.
column3:
Fíìmù nla
 
Fíìmù náà máa mú kí o ní ẹ̀dùn ara púpọ̀ tí o sì jẹ́ àmì fún eré àgbéléwò tó dára. Ó mú mi rérìn-ín, sunkún, ó sì fi ọkàn mi sónà lóríi oun tí yóò ṣẹlẹ̀. Gbígbéjáde eré náà dára púpọ̀, àwọn òṣèré náa sì se iṣé takuntakun nípa kíkó ipa a wọn. Mo gbádùn gbogbo àkókò tí mo fìi wò ó.
column4:
Fiimu nla

Fiimu naa jẹ ki o lero gbogbo ẹdun eyiti o jẹ ami ami nla fun fiimu nla kan. O mu mi rẹrin, sọkun ati ki o kun fun ifura lori ohun ti yoo ṣẹlẹ nigbamii. Isejade ti fiimu naa jẹ A1 ati pe olukopa ṣe iṣẹ nla kan ni sisọ awọn ohun kikọ wọn. Mo gbadun gbogbo iṣẹju-aaya rẹ. ”

column2:
Nice Movie

Really had a good time watching, the cast and crew weré excellent! Amazing storyline . Kudos to the actors, Directors and producer. Will definitely recommend.
column3:
Fíìmù tó wuyì
 
Mo gbádun ìgbà tí mo fi wò ó Fíìmù naa, àwọn òsèré àti ẹgbẹ́ tó kù. Fíìmù yìí gbayì. Ìtàn tó dára. Ìgbóríyìn fún àwọn òṣèré, àwọn olùdarí àti olùgbéjáde. Ó yẹ ní wíwò
column4:
"Fiimu ti o dara

Nitootọ ni akoko ti o dara wiwo, awọn oṣere ati awọn atukọ dara dara julọ! Itan iyanu. Kudos si awọn oṣere, Awọn oludari ati olupilẹṣẹ. Yoo dajudaju ṣeduro. ”

column2:
Maybe the best movie to come out of Africa in a good while!
You see Baby Police is GROUND breaking for it's time being. I totally recommend this movie for people who grandma's are dying and have a sense of culture in theré hearts.

column4:
Boya fiimu ti o dara julọ lati jade kuro ni Afirika ni akoko to dara!

column2: Painstakingly conceived and teeming with raw, unbridled energy, Eyimofe offers a sumptuous, keen-eyed look at modern Lagosian life.
column3: Iṣé ńlá lọ sínú rírò rẹ ẹ̀, ó tún wá kún fún iṣé takuntakun. Eyimofe fún wa ní ìrírí tó dáju nípa bí ìgbésí ayé àwọn ará Èkó ti rí
column4: Ti a loyun ti o ni irora ti o si kun pẹlu aise, agbara ti ko ni idaabobo, Eyimofe nfunni ni titobi pupọ, iwo oju-ara ni igbesi aye Eko ode oni.

column2:
Excellent Realistic Drama

The story excellently showcase Nigerians realities. Message worthy of the efforts put into it. Excellent casting! & you will surely love the ending.
column3:
Eré tó tayọ̣ 
 
 ìtàn náà ṣ̣e àfihàn àwọn ohun tó jé òtító nípa àwọn ọmọ Nàìjíríà.  Ẹ̀kọ́ tí ó yẹ fún àwọn ìgbìyànjú tí wọ́n ṣe e. Àwọn òṣèré fakọyọ! Wà á sì fẹ́ràn-an ìparí rè.

Ere idaraya ti o dara julọ

Itan naa ṣe afihan awọn otitọ gidi fun awọn ọmọ Naijiria. Ifiranṣẹ ti o yẹ fun awọn igbiyanju ti a fi sinu rẹ. Simẹnti ti o dara julọ! & Dajudaju iwọ yoo nifẹ ipari naa. ”

column2:
Thrilling to watch!

If you are Nigerian, then you will understand that this movie is not a cliché, the plot twist was fantastic. This movie moved from the usual Nigerian romcom and focused on suspense which was thrilling to watch and had me glued to the screen from beginning to the end! Well done to the actors, a great job, indeed!
column3:
Ó yẹ ní wíwò!
 
Tí o bá jẹ́ omo Nàìjíríà, yóò ti yé ọ wípé eré yìí kìí ṣe àsé. Ìtàn náà dára gáan. Ìtàn náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ bíi awon eré ìfẹ́ àti àwàdà Nàìjíríà tí á maá n rí, ṣùgbón ó padà wá dá lórí i fífojúsónà tí ó dún-ùn wó tó jẹ́ wípé n kò le gbójúkúrò lára ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán láti ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ dé òpin! Àwọn òsèré náà kúusé, iṣé ńlá ni lóòtóó.
column4:
"Iyanu lati wo!

Ti o ba jẹ ọmọ orilẹ-ede Naijiria, lẹhinna o yoo loye pe fiimu yii kii ṣe cliché, ipadanu idite jẹ ikọja. Fiimu yii gbe lati romcom Naijiria ti o ṣe deede ati dojukọ ifura ti o yanilenu lati wo ati pe o mu mi lẹ pọ si iboju lati ibẹrẹ si ipari! O dara si awọn oṣere, iṣẹ nla, nitootọ! ”

Beautifully written!

Theré weré no words minced and no truth, decorated falsely. This teaches a whole lot of message and exposure to the human trafficking world! Plus Sharon Ooja is such an exceptional actress.
